dcterms:description: The dataset counts power generation figures for 3 residential PV plants and power consumption measures for 15 residential homes for the whole year 2019, with data resolution of 15 minutes.
dcterms:title: Power generation and consumption dataset for residential PV plants and homes

dcterms:description: Historical data for power generation and consumption used for training a Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM) Neural Network for power forecasting.
dcterms:title: Historical data for power generation and consumption

dcterms:creator: Katiuscia Eroe
Tommaso Polci
dcterms:description: Data regarding prototype Renewable Energy Communities (RECs) in Italy, collected by Legambiente.
dcterms:title: Data regarding prototype RECs in Italy

dcterms:description: PV production data estimated using the PVGIS tool, which is a European Commission empirical model.
dcterms:title: PV production data estimated using PVGIS tool

dcterms:description: Energy purchase price data derived from the economic conditions of an Italian energy operator, referenced using the ARERA portal.
dcterms:title: Energy purchase price data from Italian energy operator

dcterms:creator: Sekyung Han
Soohee Han
Aki
dcterms:description: The battery wear cost model is based on the work of Sekyung Han, Soohee Han, and Aki (2014).
dcterms:title: Battery wear cost model data

dcterms:description: LSTM training options and meta-parameters are detailed in the paper, but no specific dataset is cited.
dcterms:title: LSTM training options and meta-parameters

dcterms:description: The GA is tested against common benchmark optimization functions, but specific datasets are not cited.
dcterms:title: Benchmark problems for GA tests
